item.description: About Us We are a fresh team that just started developing Lobium on the Alpha stage. As the team, we provide tournaments across selective competitive games and work on technologies to improve competitive gaming. We aim to get to the beta stage in the third quarter of 2021. Download All of Our Assets Our Placeholder Logo Lobium Alpha We do not prefer to use a logo until we progress further.

item.title: 20 Lobium Alpha CS:GO TR University Open 5v5 Testing Cup #1
item.description: This tournament has ended. The winner is Akdeniz University, congratulations! Game Name Region Date CS:GO Lobium Alpha University Open 5v5 Testing Cup #1 TR Saturday, 08-Feb-20 The tournament matches is going to start on 8th of February 2020 at 02:00 PM (UTC +03 / Istanbul). Brackets are going to have double elimination schedule with best of one matches while the grand final being best of three.
